tutorials.description: We'll introduce the queue. If it overflows, it's game over!

steps.title: Introducing the Queue
steps.text: As tickets come in, the dispatcher must get them to technicians. If you get too behind, it'll spell trouble!

tutorials.description: We'll introduce the color code. The right ticket needs to get to the right tech.

steps.title: Color-Coding Tickets
steps.text: Make sure the color shermie reach the color goal, to score points

tutorials.description: We'll introduce Gates. Sometimes a tech is out of office and you can't get a ticket to them.

steps.title: Gates barriers
steps.text: Some goal zones would be closed at certain times, becareful and make sure to not reach one where the gate is closed

tutorials.description: We'll introduce Bomb Shermie. Some tickets are time-critical – take care of them fast!

steps.title: Bomb Shermie
steps.text: Some Shermies will be bombs, which needs to reach the goal as soon as possible

tutorials.description: We'll introduce Toxic Shermie. Some tickets need to be waited on and put back into the queue.

steps.title: Toxic Shermie
steps.text: Toxic Shermie are light color green, they will have enter the hopsital to clear away their toxicity

tutorials.description: We'll introduce Powerup 1: Invulnerability. Some tickets are much simpler once you use the powerup!

steps.title: Invulnerability Powerup
steps.text: Shermie will recivice a # second invulnerability, which allows shermie to reach the goal unharmed

tutorials.description: We'll introduce Powerup 2: Clense. This powerup is super helpful, and you'll need it!

steps.title: Powerup 2
steps.text: This powerup will clear any amornelity of shermie that is currently being applied, instead it will turn in into a regular shermie

tutorials.description: We'll introduce Powerup 3. This powerup is super helpful, and you'll need it!

steps.title: Powerup 3
steps.text: Powerup 3 is going to make your life easier. Use it wisely and keep the queue under control.

steps.title: Last Test
steps.text: Since you had learned all of the mechanics, this would the final test to see you got what it takes.
